Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Kedzie (Orange Line)
ShortDescription: Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie (Orange Line), 51st, California, and 47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie (Orange Line), 51st, California, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Kedzie (Orange Line).

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Division
ShortDescription: #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted  via Laramie, Division, Cicero, North Avenue, and Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Division, Cicero, North Avenue, and Laramie, due to police activity near Laramie/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Western.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
